name: First National Bank of Altoona v. Turchetta, Appellant

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Brien, JJ.
Mr. Justice Benjamin R. Jones and Mr. Justice Cohen dissent.
parties: First National Bank of Altoona v. Turchetta, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
The order of the court below is affirmed on the opinion by Judge Swirles L. Himes, specially presiding in the Court of Common Pleas of Blair County.
Mr. Justice Benjamin R. Jones and Mr. Justice Cohen dissent.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Alexander A. Notopoulos, with him Martin Goodman, and Goodman & Notopoulos, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
First National Bank of Altoona v. Turchetta, Appellant.
Argued May 8, 1962.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Brien, JJ.
May 24, 1962:
James M. Dente, for appellant.
Alexander A. Notopoulos, with him Martin Goodman, and Goodman & Notopoulos, for appellee.
